Gets a value that indicates whether the has been applied to a property resulting in the immutable state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When the PropertyMetadata.IsSealed is equal to `true`, the following operations cause a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> to be raised:
- Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.DefaultValue%2A>.
- Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.Options%2A>.
- Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A>.
- Attempting to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.GetValueOverride%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnApply (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty dependencyProperty, Type targetType);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnApply(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty dependencyProperty, class System.Type targetType) cil managed

Docs.param: The to which this has been applied.
The <xref:System.Type> associated with this metadata if this instance is type-specific metadata. If this is default metadata, this value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Docs.summary: Provides processing when this is applied to a dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Sends notification that this metadata has been applied to a property, and the metadata is being sealed. This routine is no-op in this implementation.
